Title: Stellar activity mimics a habitable-zone planet around Kapteyn's star
Authors: Robertson P., Roy A., Mahadevan S. 
Figure: I_H{alpha}_ measurements from HARPS and HIRES
================================================================================
Byte-by-byte Description of file: dbf2.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Bytes Format Units   Label  Explanations
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1-  5 A5     ---     Spec   Spectrograph used
   7- 22 F16.8  d       BJD    Barycentric Julian Date
  24- 28 F5.2   m/s     RVel   Radial velocity
  30- 33 F4.2   m/s   e_RVel   The 1{sigma} uncertainty in RVel
  35- 41 F7.5   ---     IHa    H{alpha} activity index
  43- 49 F7.5   ---   e_IHa    The 1{sigma} uncertainty in IHa
  51- 57 F7.5   ---     ID     ? Na I D resonance activity index
  59- 65 F7.5   ---   e_ID     ? The 1{sigma} uncertainty in ID
  67- 73 F7.5   km/s    FWHM   ? Full-Width at Half-Maximum of HARPS CCF
  75- 79 F5.2   m/s   e_FWHM   ? The 1{sigma} uncertainty in FWHM
  81- 87 F7.3   m/s     BIS    ? Bisector Inverse Slope
  89- 93 F5.3   m/s   e_BIS    ? The 1{sigma} uncertainty in BIS
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
